name: King Pong (Morkkis)
description:
A remake for the classic Pong game. This was made as a school project for a game dev course by a group of 4 students. We do not own the music track used in this game.

This game has modes for classic pong, local head-to-head, player vs. computer and computer vs. computer. There is two different speed settings for the racket and a "wall" -power which shields your goal for 3 secs.

How to play:

P1:

W - Up

S - Down

A - Lower speed

D - Higher speed

Q - Wall

P2:

UpArrow - Up

DownArrow - Down

LeftArrow - Lower speed

RightArrow - Higher speed

P - Wall

Best experienced in full screen.
